contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox_River | river_name = Xinxim River | image_name = | image_size = | caption = | origin = [[Pará]] state | mouth = | basin_countries = [[Brazil]] | length = | elevation = | mouth_elevation = | discharge = | watershed = }} The '''Xinxim River''' is a river of [[Pará]] state in north-central [[Brazil]]. ==See also== *[[List of rivers of Pará]] ==References== *[http://www.zonu.com/imapa/americas/md_Para_brazil.pdf Brazilian Ministry of Transport] {{Pará-geo-stub}} [[Category:Rivers of Pará]] {{coord missing|Brazil}}
